title: Hostages Urge Shabbos Observance
body: Four Israeli hostages, Ohad Ben Ami, Raz Ben Ami, Almog Meir Jan, and Elkana Bohbot, who spent months to years in Hamas captivity, are calling on Jews to keep Shabbos together as part of the global Shabbos Project.

title: Motzoei Shabbos Navi Shiur
body: Rabbi Doniel Neustadt's Motzoei Shabbos Navi Shiur returns to Pine River Village Shul, delving into Sefer Shmuel. The weekly shiur launches Motzoei Shabbos Parshas Vayeira, November 8.
